/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees and buildings on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the concrete structures. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the vastness of the cityscape.
